file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-73-00-06 - OUTER BY-PASS DUCT - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OUTER BY-PASS DUCT - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the outer by-pass duct and rear support assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY OUTER BY-PASS DUCT AND REAR SUP- ALL 72-73-00-200-801-A PORT ASSEMBLY EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-73-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-73-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OUTER BY-PASS DUCT AND REAR SUPPORT ASSEMBLY A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400 NACELLE APRON - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400 APRON - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the workstand in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-73-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the related components: (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400). J. Outer By-Pass Duct and Rear Support Assy - GVI SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Visually inspect the outer by-pass duct and rear support assembly. Refer to the last revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the related components: (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand from work area.
